title: Modern Tech-Hub Oasis
description: A stunning 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom contemporary home located just minutes from the main tech campus. This property features an expansive open-floor plan, floor-to-ceiling windows that capture the sunset perfectly, and a high-end chef's kitchen with marble countertops. The backyard is a private retreat with a sustainable organic garden and a small stone firepit for evening gatherings.

title: Vintage Charm Bungalow
description: Step back in time with this beautifully maintained 1920s bungalow. Located in the historic district, it boasts original oak hardwood floors, vintage crown molding, and a wrap-around porch perfect for morning coffee. While it retains its classic soul, the electrical and plumbing systems have been fully modernized for peace of mind. Includes a detached garage that could be a perfect studio.
